attributes.action: Ensure that Ben and Jerry put on general sale the ice cream created for Stephen Fry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephen Fry is a national icon and as such we should all be able to show our appreciation for him by being able to buy and more importantly eat the ice cream created for him by Ben and Jerrys!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
